function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Excessive use of IT systems in housing units due to smart working, online lessons, and entertainment activities increases the risk of indoor contagious disease propagation.","Impact":"Increased probability of contagious disease spread due to prolonged indoor activities and close contact among family members.","Mitigation":"Promote ventilation and air circulation within the living spaces, encourage the use of outdoor spaces when possible, and practice good hygiene and sanitation measures.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC (Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning) systems, IoT monitoring for indoor air quality.","People":"Family members living in the same housing unit, especially those engaged in smart working, online lessons, and entertainment activities.","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers, public health authorities, and employers."},{"Description":"Introduction of new high-performing computer networks like 5G may result in increased exposure of the population to radio frequency electromagnetic fields, leading to potential health risks.","Impact":"Uncertain health effects linked with exposure to 5G wireless technologies, potential risk of adverse health impacts for individuals exposed to high-frequency electromagnetic fields.","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive scientific research on the health effects of 5G technologies, implement regulations and guidelines to limit exposure levels, and educate the public on potential risks and safety measures.","Technologies":"Advanced radiation measurement devices, electromagnetic field shielding technologies, 5G network monitoring and control systems.","People":"General population living in areas with 5G networks, telecommunications industry, regulatory bodies, public health organizations.","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, telecommunications companies, public health agencies, scientific research institutions."}]}
